originalText.text: The staff was quick, friendly and nice to me. The doctor was also thorough and help me understand what I needed to do, as well as explain any anomalies easy to talk to, and got me in an Aircast and out the door after x-rays it was the same as experience I wish all Doctor visits were this easy.

text.text: The staff was quick, friendly and nice to me. The doctor was also thorough and help me understand what I needed to do, as well as explain any anomalies easy to talk to, and got me in an Aircast and out the door after x-rays it was the same as experience I wish all Doctor visits were this easy.

originalText.text:
Dr Levy is great. He is cheery, efficient and knows his stuff. This is only my 2nd time at his office. Last year, I saw him and he quickly diagnosed me and got me on a plan for recovery that most importantly works, and suits my lifestyle.

His staff is also quite lovely and I was in and out in about 30 minutes. No long wait or bunch of people in the waiting room. I wish every Doctor visits went so smoothly.

My feet have seen about a 90% improvement without any steroids. After discussing with the doctor we decided this was the best treatment for me.

I would Say Dr Levy os knowledgeable,  accommodating, and personable.

originalText.text: Dr. Levy is simply the best! He’s personable and takes the time to answer all your questions. He’s highly skilled and you can trust you’re in good hands with Dr. Levy.

text.text: Dr. Levy is simply the best! He’s personable and takes the time to answer all your questions. He’s highly skilled and you can trust you’re in good hands with Dr. Levy.

originalText.text: I’ve been seeing DR. Levy since 2011 I believe.  I’ve gotten two foot surgeries.  I was born with flat feet with no arch as I got older it’s been hard for me to do certain activities but this Doctor fixed it. Thanks DR. Brian Levy you’re the best and also he’s entire staff are respectful & helpful. I have no complaints and highly recommend anyone with foot pain or problems go to any location.
